RESOURCE.NAME: Entity Classification Job Builder
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Build a CrowdFlower job asking users to select the right label for entities

PARAMETER.NAME: skipExisting
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should we skip snippets that already have a feature indicating that they have been processed before?

PARAMETER.NAME: apiKey
PARAMETER.COMMENT: CrowdFlower API key

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

RESOURCE.NAME: Entity Classification Results Importer
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Import judgments from a CrowdFlower job created by the Entity Classification Job Builder as GATE annotations.

PARAMETER.NAME: apiKey
PARAMETER.COMMENT: CrowdFlower API key

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

RESOURCE.NAME: Majority-vote consensus builder (classification)
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Process results of a crowd annotation task to find where annotators agree and disagree.

PARAMETER.NAME: resultAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Type of the annotations representing crowd judgments

PARAMETER.NAME: resultASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation set containing the annotations representing crowd judgments

PARAMETER.NAME: answerFeatureName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The feature on result annotations giving the selected answer

PARAMETER.NAME: entityAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Type of the original entity annotations that were imported to form CrowdFlower units.

PARAMETER.NAME: originalEntityASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation set containing the original entity annotations that were imported to form CrowdFlower units

PARAMETER.NAME: consensusASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation set into which consensus annotations (which meet the minimum agreement threshold) should be placed

PARAMETER.NAME: disputeASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation set in which disputed annotations should be created. Exactly what form these annotations take depends on the noAgreementAction.

PARAMETER.NAME: minimumAgreement
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Minimum number of annotators who must agree for the entity to be approved and moved into the consensus set.

PARAMETER.NAME: noAgreementAction
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The action to take on annotations which do not meet the minimum agreement threshold.

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

RESOURCE.NAME: Entity Annotation Job Builder
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Build a CrowdFlower job asking users to annotate entities within a snippet of text

PARAMETER.NAME: entityAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation type representing the gold standard annotations, i.e. the kind of entities that you want workers to find.

PARAMETER.NAME: entityASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation set where gold entities can be found

PARAMETER.NAME: skipExisting
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should we skip snippets that already have a feature indicating that they have been processed before?

PARAMETER.NAME: snippetAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation type for the "snippet" annotations. One snippet = one CrowdFlower unit

PARAMETER.NAME: snippetASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation set where snippet annotations can be found

PARAMETER.NAME: tokenAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation type representing the "tokens" - the atomic units that workers will have to select to mark entity annotations.

PARAMETER.NAME: tokenASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation set where tokens can be found

PARAMETER.NAME: detailFeatureName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Feature on the snippet annotations containing additional details to be shown to the annotators. This is interpreted as HTML, and can be used for example to show a list of clickable links extracted from the snippet.

PARAMETER.NAME: goldFeatureName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Name of a feature that marks a snippet as "gold"

PARAMETER.NAME: goldFeatureValue
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Value of the feature that marks a snippet as "gold"

PARAMETER.NAME: goldReasonFeatureName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Feature on gold snippet annotations explaining why the snippet's entities are correct

PARAMETER.NAME: apiKey
PARAMETER.COMMENT: CrowdFlower API key

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

RESOURCE.NAME: Entity Annotation Results Importer
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Import judgments from a CrowdFlower job created by the Entity Annotation Job Builder as GATE annotations.

PARAMETER.NAME: annotateSpans
PARAMETER.COMMENT: If true (the default), create one annotation for each contiguous run of marked tokens, if false, annotate each token separately.

PARAMETER.NAME: snippetAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation type representing the snippets (one snippet = one unit)

PARAMETER.NAME: snippetASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation set where the snippets can be found

PARAMETER.NAME: tokenAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation type representing the "tokens" - the atomic units that workers have selected to mark entity annotations.

PARAMETER.NAME: tokenASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation set where tokens can be found

PARAMETER.NAME: apiKey
PARAMETER.COMMENT: CrowdFlower API key

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

RESOURCE.NAME: Majority-vote consensus builder (annotation)
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Process results of a crowd annotation task to find where annotators agree and disagree.

PARAMETER.NAME: resultAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation type to process

PARAMETER.NAME: resultASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation set containing the entity annotations generated from crowd judgments

PARAMETER.NAME: consensusASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation set into which consensus annotations should be placed. Only annotations that were marked by at least the minimum number of annotators will be moved to this set

PARAMETER.NAME: disputeASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation set into which disputed annotations should be placed.

PARAMETER.NAME: minimumAgreement
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Minimum number of annotators who must agree on a single annotation span for it to be approved and added to the consensus set

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process
